text: Mouryan is a 2006 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Kailas Rao. The film stars Abbas, Geethu Mohandas, Geetha, and Suja Karthika in lead roles. The film had musical score by Kaithapram Vishwanathan Nambudiri. ==Cast== *Abbas *Geethu Mohandas *Geetha *Suja Karthika *Jagathy Sreekumar *Manorama *Rajan P. Dev *Indrans *Harishree Ashokan *Vijayaraghavan *Kochu Preman *Devan ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Kaithapram Vishwanathan Nambudiri and lyrics were written by Kaithapram. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" !
